document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic monograph of the Middle American leaf-litter inhabiting weevil genus Theognete Champion (Coleoptera: Curculionidae; Molytinae; Lymantini) 2458

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A taxonomic monograph of the Middle American leaf-litter inhabiting weevil genus Theognete Champion (Coleoptera: Curculionidae; Molytinae; Lymantini) 2458

subSubSection.paragraph:
32.
Theognete cortesi Anderson
, new species
( Figures 139 , 174 , 209 )

Diagnosis. Size. Length, male, 2.86–3.20mm ; female, 3.20–3.46mm . Width, male, 1.79–2.00mm; female, 1.96–2.13mm . As for
T. tzotzil
except aedeagus as in Fig. 174 .
Natural history . Collected from berlese extraction of cloud forest leaf litter at elevations ranging from 2000–2450m .
Derivation of specific name . Named after Jorge León Cortés, lepidopterist at ECOSUR, San Cristóbal de las Casas, Chiapas , México .

Material examined .
201♂ , 110♀♀ ( BMNH , CMNC , CWOB , ECOS , UNAM , USNM , UVGC )
.

:

Chorological relationships . Sympatric with
T. huitepec , T. illuviosa , T. weadockae , T. backorum , T. jonesi
and
T. campbelli .
